snippet: The ceramists James Klein and David Reid live in Jackson Heights with their own and others’ works, vintage furniture and a few beloved unidentified objects.
abstract: Ceramists James Klein and David Reid love their Jackson Heights, Queens, apartment for its eclectic combination of styles, including their own works.
lead_paragraph: The ceramists James Klein and David Reid live in Jackson Heights with their own and others’ works, vintage furniture and a few beloved unidentified objects.

headline.print_headline: A Dab of History, a Bit of Mystery
headline.main: In Queens, Ceramics, History, and a Bit of Mystery
headline.kicker: What I Love | James Klein and David Reid
